description:
The Origami Family is a family entrusted with the management of noro produced in the creation of http://anidb.net/t7101 [okatana]. The family`s role traces back to the ancient times where they served a similar role in the Imperial Court, and continues to the present time, where the current head of the family also acts as the chief of the http://anidb.net/ch95155 [Special Sword Administration Bureau]. All of the current top-ranking http://anidb.net/t7097 [toji] serve managing roles in toji training institutions, also called the http://anidb.net/ch95156 [Five Traditions].
Source: Toji no Miko Wiki
name: Origami-ke
